type.description: With type 'date' it requires to be in an specific timeframe to reveal the Task

fromDate.description: Timestamp with the begining of the timeframe

toDate.description: Timestamp with the end of the timeframe

type.description: With type 'completedQuest' requires a Quest with the specified ID to be completed.

questId.description: ID of the quest that must be completed

type.description: With type 'completedPrevious' requires the Task defined on the “previousTask” parameter to be completed. This requirement can only be applied to Tasks.
With type 'completedTaskInCurrentQuest' requires a Task with the specified ID of the current Quest to be completed.

taskId.description: ID of the task that must be completed

type.description: With the type 'completedTaskInAnyQuest' Completed Task in the Any Quest: requires an specific Task to be completed in any of the previous instances of the same Quest.

taskId.description: ID of the task that must be completed
